body: Indoor Activities                    Inside this historic building you will find stories of the past as well as connections to history being made today.                Meet park rangers and volunteers who can provide brochures and maps of the area. Browse the park’s exhibits, bookstore, interactive kiosks, and view the orientation film. The park has area brochures inside the visitor center to help you plan your visit before you step onto New Bedford’s cobblestone streets and explore this historic area.
title: New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park: Indoor Activities
